title: Stereotype of girls and boys in class

content.description: Mr. Harding teaches two classes. His early afternoon class consists of mostly boys, while his late afternoon class consists of mostly girls. He believes that girls tend to be calmer than boys, so he expects that his late afternoon class will be easier than his early afternoon class.
